channel.title: [639] Error with ShopEditor.bat [639]
channel.description:
[b]Hey Guy's, i've done this error by adding 2shops in 1 npc, and i get this error when i start up the ShopEditor.bat[/b]
Loading item definitions... Loaded 20430 item definitions. Loading range weapon info... Loaded 184 range weapon definitions. Loading range ammunition info... Loaded 219 ammunition definitions. Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.nio.BufferUnderflowException at java.nio.Buffer.nextGetIndex(Buffer.java:472) at java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.get(DirectByteBuffer.java:219) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor.load(ShopEditor.java:378) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor.(ShopEditor.java:70) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor$9.run(ShopEditor.java:348) at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(InvocationEvent.java:209) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(EventQueue.java:641) at java.awt.EventQueue.access$000(EventQueue.java:84) at java.awt.EventQueue$1.run(EventQueue.java:602) at java.awt.EventQueue$1.run(EventQueue.java:600) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.security.AccessControlContext$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(AccessCo ntrolContext.java:87) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:611) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThre ad.java:269) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread. java:184) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThre ad.java:174) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:169) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:161) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:122)]Loading item definitions... Loaded 20430 item definitions. Loading range weapon info... Loaded 184 range weapon definitions. Loading range ammunition info... Loaded 219 ammunition definitions. Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.nio.BufferUnderflowException at java.nio.Buffer.nextGetIndex(Buffer.java:472) at java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.get(DirectByteBuffer.java:219) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor.load(ShopEditor.java:378) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor.(ShopEditor.java:70) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor$9.run(ShopEditor.java:348) at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(InvocationEvent.java:209) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(EventQueue.java:641) at java.awt.EventQueue.access$000(EventQueue.java:84) at java.awt.EventQueue$1.run(EventQueue.java:602) at java.awt.EventQueue$1.run(EventQueue.java:600) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.security.AccessControlContext$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(AccessCo ntrolContext.java:87) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:611) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThre ad.java:269) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread. java:184) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThre ad.java:174) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:169) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:161) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:122)
[b]And on RunServer.bat i get this:[/b]
[Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers. [World] Loading World... [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 47 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 48 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 2649 drops [SpellContainer] Loading magic spells... [SpellContainer] Loaded 43 magic spell handlers. [SpecialAttackContainer] Loading special attacks... [SpecialAttackContainer] Loaded 37 special attacks. [DialogueManager] Loading dialogues... [DialogueManager] Loaded 35 dialogues. [DialogueManager] Loading NPC dialogue ids... [DialogueManager] Loaded 1 NPC dialogue ids. java.io.EOFException at java.io.RandomAccessFile.readByte(RandomAccessFile.java:625) at org.dementhium.model.player.ShopManager.load(ShopManager.java:18) at org.dementhium.model.World.load(World.java:119) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:43) [ShopManager] Loaded 33 Shops [ObjectManager] Loading objects... [ObjectManager] Loaded 33 objects. [ItemDefinition] Loading item definitions... [ItemDefinition] Loaded 20430 item definitions. [RangeWeapon] Loading range weapon info... [RangeWeapon] Loaded 184 range weapon definitions. [Ammunition] Loading range ammunition info... [Ammunition] Loaded 219 ammunition definitions. [NPCDefinition] Loading npc definitions... [NPCDefinition] Loaded 13488 npc definitions. [NPCLoader] Loading customized NPC classes... [NPCLoader] Loaded 86 customized NPCs. [NPCLoader] Loading default npc spawns... [NPCLoader] Loaded 3730 default npc spawns. [EventManager] Loading event listeners... [EventManager] Loaded 27 interface listeners and 319 object listeners. [DementhiumShutdownHook] Shutdown hook initialized! [ImpetuousImpulses] Spawned all implings: puro-puro count: 40, world count: 26 Server bound to port - 43594
[b]Someone got any solution about this?[/b]

item.title: [639] Error with ShopEditor.bat [639]
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Take one of the shops off it? :L or just add a dialogue thing where you can list several shops…

like when you speak to the shop-keeper, it will say like;

Food
Weapons
Armour

And clicking on whichever will open up a different shop, rather than having it so when you ‘trade’ it’s trying to open 2 interfaces with different items, which it obviously doesn’t like… haha

Read full topic
